trans-unit.source: How to activate an app (DirectX and C++)
trans-unit.target: How to activate an app (DirectX and C++)

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to define the activation experience for a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) DirectX app.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows how to define the activation experience for a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) DirectX app.

trans-unit.source: How to activate an app (DirectX and C++)
trans-unit.target: How to activate an app (DirectX and C++)

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to define the activation experience for a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) DirectX app.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows how to define the activation experience for a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) DirectX app.

trans-unit.source: Register the app activation event handler
trans-unit.target: Register the app activation event handler

trans-unit.source: First, register to handle the [**CoreApplicationView::Activated**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225018) event, which is raised when your app is started and initialized by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: First, register to handle the [**CoreApplicationView::Activated**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225018) event, which is raised when your app is started and initialized by the operating system.

trans-unit.source: Add this code to your implementation of the [**IFrameworkView::Initialize**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh700495) method of your view provider (named **MyViewProvider** in the example):
trans-unit.target: Add this code to your implementation of the [**IFrameworkView::Initialize**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh700495) method of your view provider (named **MyViewProvider** in the example):

trans-unit.source: Activate the CoreWindow instance for the app
trans-unit.target: Activate the CoreWindow instance for the app

trans-unit.source: When your app starts, you must obtain a reference to the [**CoreWindow**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208225) for your app.
trans-unit.target: When your app starts, you must obtain a reference to the [**CoreWindow**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208225) for your app.

trans-unit.source: **CoreWindow** contains the window event message dispatcher that your app uses to process window events.
trans-unit.target: **CoreWindow** contains the window event message dispatcher that your app uses to process window events.

trans-unit.source: Obtain this reference in your callback for the app activation event by calling [**CoreWindow::GetForCurrentThread**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh701589).
trans-unit.target: Obtain this reference in your callback for the app activation event by calling [**CoreWindow::GetForCurrentThread**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh701589).

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this reference, activate the main app window by calling [**CoreWindow::Activate**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208254).
trans-unit.target: Once you have obtained this reference, activate the main app window by calling [**CoreWindow::Activate**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208254).

trans-unit.source: Start processing event message for the main app window
trans-unit.target: Start processing event message for the main app window

trans-unit.source: Your callbacks occur as event messages are processed by the [**CoreDispatcher**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208211) for the app's [**CoreWindow**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208225).
trans-unit.target: Your callbacks occur as event messages are processed by the [**CoreDispatcher**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208211) for the app's [**CoreWindow**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208225).

trans-unit.source: This callback will not be invoked if you do not call [**CoreDispatcher::ProcessEvents**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208215) from your app's main loop (implemented in the [**IFrameworkView::Run**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh700505) method of your view provider).
trans-unit.target: This callback will not be invoked if you do not call [**CoreDispatcher::ProcessEvents**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208215) from your app's main loop (implemented in the [**IFrameworkView::Run**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh700505) method of your view provider).
